# Checklist:


* [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
* [ ] I have written unit tests to `tests` and run `pytest`
* [ ] I have commented my code
* [ ] I have updated the README when appropriate
* [ ] I have updated the documentation 
* [ ] I have run `flake8 .`
